    "file": "file:///home/user/sqlite-manager/testdata/data.csv",

    "bColNames": false, "ignoreTrailingDelimiter": false,
    "charset": "UTF-8"}
  ],

    "file": "file:///home/user/sqlite-manager/testdata/460.csv",

    "bColNames": false, "ignoreTrailingDelimiter": false,
    "charset": "UTF-8"}
  ],

  //,, means the field between them is null
